title: DDFP 459:  2nd Best WR of All-Time & Jets QB Situation
itunes:title: DDFP 459:  2nd Best WR of All-Time & Jets QB Situation
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank, NFL Media’s Dan Hanzus and Bucky Brooks.  The guys debate who is the 2nd best WR of all-time behind Jerry Rice, the Jets QB situation, the best trophy in sports & who is the most important figure to any one professional franchise.  Plus, the guys discuss the Warriors comeback series win against the Thunder and whether LeBron James can beat Steph Curry in the NBA Finals.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
